Package com.elite.game.client

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientLaunch
    Launch point of the client.
    NetworkWrapper
    Static class to store connection to server and associated data/objects.
    ServerUpdateHandler
    The behaviour in this class is part of the PlayState update method/loop but has been refactored out into it's own class to stop PlayState becoming too large.
    TCPReceiverThread
    Thread designed to run on the client side and continuously read in String objects and store them in the tcpInQueue in NetworkWrapper where they can be accessed by whatever game state is currently active.
    TCPSenderThread
    Thread designed to run on the client side and continuously send to the server the String objects stored in the tcpOutQueue in NetworkWrapper A flag in NetworkWrapper is also used by the host's client to tell this thread to send the weapon coordinates after loading the map.
    UDPReceiverThread
    Thread designed to run on the client side and continuously read in Datagram packets and store their data contents in the udpInQueue in NetworkWrapper where they can be accessed by whatever game state is currently active.
    UDPSenderThread
    Thread designed to run on the client side and continuously send to the server the byte arrays stored in the udpOutQueue in NetworkWrapper
